name: Block-Blaster
description:
Breakout clone using Lovedos (love2d dos version).

First time trying out love2d in any form.

Fun to learn and try out.

Built for miniLD #71

Features:

  • Random block generation
  • Random colors
  • 10 levels to win game.

To Do:

  • Plenty of bugs
  • No sound
  • Velocity increase each level
  • Smoother game play
